class.name: Index
class.description: This plugin is designed to ease the use of a PR2 robot that has been fitted with BioTac Syntouch sensors. The plugin consists of multiple modules which can be opened up simultaneously, including custom modules that perform visualization, data analysis, and PR2 movement.

qtgui.label: PR2 Hand and Syntouch Sensor Real-Time Interface
qtgui.statustip: Plugin to be used with a PR2 robot that has BioTac Syntouch Sensors installed.
